lyrics:

i sit and watch you readin with your head low
i wake and watch you breathin with your eyes closed
i sit and watch you
i notice everything you do or dont do
youre so much older and wiser and i

chorus
i wait by the door like im just a kid
use my best colors for your portrait
lay the table with the fancy shit
and watch you tolerate it
if its all in my head tell me now
tell me ive got it wrong somehow

but you tolerate it

verse 2
i greet you with a battle heros welcome

i sit and listеn
i polish plates until they gleam and glistеn
youre so much older and wiser and i

chorus
i wait by the door like im just a kid
use my best colors for your portrait
lay the table with the fancy shit
and watch you tolerate it
if its all in my head tell me now
tell me ive got it wrong somehow
i know my love should be celebrated
but you tolerate it
see taylor swift liveget tickets as low as 172you might also likebridge

wheres that man whod throw blankets over my barbed wire

drawin hearts in the byline

you assume im fine but what would you do if i i

break free and leave us in ruins
